reviewText: Fantastic show. Very informative about a species people know little of. Not very graphic. Enjoyed very much.

This is simply stunning. Lions wandering about and adjacent to villages - even strolling past people with barely a nod (either way!). What to me is even More striking and telling, is the continuing acceptance of the Indian people towards animals - all animals, not just cattle, but rats (who have an entire temple dedicated to them) monkeys that overrun just about everything, and now lions. The People have a reverence towards all Life forms. We have a lot to be learned from their attitudes. A lot!
